metadata.name: Suspicious Creation TXT File in User Desktop
metadata.comment: Ransomware create txt file in the user Desktop

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\desktop\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.txt')))

output.summary: Ransomware create txt file in the user Desktop
